name: Cerub PR
description:
Cerub PR is a vibrant, no-nonsense public relations agency which focuses on getting you the best publicity possible to drive your business.
Our multi-sector experience ensures we're able to develop the right stories to put in front of the right people at the right time. For our clients, this means coverage across the media. Our clients have seen coverage appear in media ranging from World Service, Sky News, The Daily Mail, The Financial Times, The Sunday Times and BBC 5 Live to name just a few.
READ MORE...
